message: Successfully Fetched the list for events on calendar

events.title: 🎉 Party
events.subtitle: Annual company celebration
events.desc: Join us for the office annual party at 7 PM with food, drinks, and music. 🥳 Agenda: Awards, networking, and performances.

events.title: 📅 Meeting
events.subtitle: Monthly Team Sync
events.desc: Team sync scheduled at 11 AM to discuss progress and blockers. 🧩 Agenda: Sprint review and planning.

events.title: 🏥 Checkup
events.subtitle: Health check-up appointment
events.desc: Health check-up at Apollo Hospital, 10 AM slot. 🩺 Agenda: Routine wellness exam and reports collection.

events.title: 🎬 Movie
events.subtitle: Dune 2 screening
events.desc: Watch Dune 2 at 8 PM at INOX Theatre with friends. 🍿 Agenda: Grab snacks and enjoy the sci-fi thrill.

events.title: ❤️ Date
events.subtitle: Valentine’s Day dinner
events.desc: Dinner with A at Le Cirque. 🌹 Agenda: Reservation at 8 PM, candlelight dinner & gift exchange.

events.title: 🌹 Gift
events.subtitle: Buy flowers and gifts
events.desc: Pick up roses and chocolates before evening. 💐 Agenda: Surprise your loved one in style.

events.title: 🎓 Webinar
events.subtitle: Angular Masterclass
events.desc: Live Angular Masterclass at 6 PM via Zoom. 💻 Agenda: Learn about standalone components and signals.

events.title: 🛒 Shopping
events.subtitle: Grocery shopping trip
events.desc: Buy monthly essentials from DMart. 🛍️ Agenda: Stock up on staples, toiletries, and snacks.

events.title: 🎂 B'day
events.subtitle: Nina’s birthday celebration
events.desc: Celebrate Nina's birthday with a brunch at her place. 🎈 Agenda: Cake cutting, games, and gifts.

events.title: 🌟 Leap Day
events.subtitle: Special day celebration
events.desc: It's a leap year! Celebrate this rare day with something fun. 🌠 Agenda: Reflect, journal, or try something new!
